__e: It's not easy when someone accuses you of screwing up, especially when you know it's true.
I'm sure no one would accuse you otherwise, but my husband has nothing to do with this.
That is twice in one day you've accused me of killing the woman I love.
Isn't that what you accused your former doctor of doing? Mm-hmm. This ring needs to come off now.
And if you accused brother in front of others or our parents..
Once you accuse your wife of trying to kill your mom, you'd think I would have walked away or something.
